:mod:`taskcontroller.multiprocess` -- Multiprocess task controller
==================================================================

.. module:: pebl.taskcontroller.multiprocess
    :synopsis: Multiprocess task controller

The multiprocess task controller creates a pool of processes and runs tasks using them.

Configuration Parameters
------------------------

.. Autogenerated by pebl.config.paramdocs at Wed Apr 30 14:56:47 2008

.. confparam:: multiprocess.poolsize

	Number of processes to run concurrently (0 means no limit)
	default=0

MultiProcessController Class
----------------------------

.. autoclass:: MultiProcessController
    :members:
